Hello, this is Ahmed. I built this project while learning android studio. Blood Locator is an app where we can search for blood donors filtered by blood group on the map (powered by Mapbox), then look up contact details. The donor records can be added by the user themselves.\nUsage - If you tap the gps button, it will locate your position and prompt you to add your info on the map. Or you can long click (hold) a point on the map, and add an entry in that position as well. To search for blood, just pick a blood group option and see if there\'s any blood marker nearby.
